title: Czech Republic
summary: Citi operates in the Czech Republic through Citibank Europe plc, organizační složka, and provides its innovative banking products and services to a broad spectrum of customers, including large corporations, global companies, domestic companies, financial institutions and public sector entities.
tag-2: Citi Czech Republic: a market leader in corporate banking since 1991
tag-3: Citi operates in the Czech Republic through Citibank Europe plc, organizační složka, and provides its innovative banking products and services to a broad spectrum of customers, including large corporations, global companies, domestic companies, financial institutions and public sector entities.
tag-16: For the Citibank Czech Republic website, visit www.citibank.cz.
